title: akrun Analytics | Elevating businesses into Singularity
text:
Welcome to akrun Analytics, where data transforms into actionable insights, and innovation fuels our passion for business analytics. Meet Arun Kirshna Sasikala Appukuttan, our distinguished Chief Data Scientist, leading the charge in converting raw data into strategic intelligence.
Arun’s dedication to the realm of data is unparalleled. When not spearheading advancements in data platforms, he immerses himself in Stack Overflow, ranking in the top 0.01% overall. His commitment to knowledge sharing is evident with over 37,000 statistics-related answers, making him an invaluable global resource.
Beyond providing insights, Arun is the all-time top R contributor on Stack Overflow, showcasing mastery in statistical programming and influencing the data science landscape.
At akrun Analytics, we leverage Arun’s expertise to navigate business analytics complexities. With keen innovation and insatiable curiosity, Arun empowers businesses through data-driven decision-making. Join us on this transformative journey, where data meets excellence, and let akrun Analytics be your guiding compass. Together, we elevate your data strategies, driving unprecedented success in the dynamic world of business analytics.


Seneca -
 We are mad, not only individually but nationally. 
 We check manslaughter and isolated murders, but what of war 
 and the much-vaunted crime of slaughtering whole peoples?

title: Customer Reviews
text:
Welcome to our Testimonials and Reviews section, where our customers’ voices shine. Dive into a collection of genuine feedback reflecting satisfaction, trust, and appreciation for our products/services. These testimonials encapsulate our commitment to quality, service, and innovation.
Explore diverse perspectives from our clients, sharing insights into the impact we’ve had on individuals and businesses. Join us in celebrating the relationships and success stories created through shared experiences.
Thank you for considering the thoughts of those who matter most – our incredible customers.



Explore the exceptional feedback on akrun in the Reddit community showcased below.

title: About
text:
Arun Kirshna Sasikala Appukuttan: Analytics pro with 20+ years (10+ industry, 10+ research). Expert in R (15+ yrs), Python (5), SQL (5), Java (2+). Holds a Ph.D. in Quantitative Genetics. Passionate about tech, data, and cutting-edge analytics. Proven track record, dynamic and innovative approach.





University of Maryland | College Park, MD | PhD in Quantitative Genetics | Aug 2006 - May 2010
South Dakota State University | Brooking, SD | MS in Dairy Nutrition | Aug 2004 - Jul 2006



Ames Energy | Head Data Scientist | Oct 2018 - present
Scifluent | Data Scientist|Data Engineer | Jul 2018 - Apr 2020
Accenture | Analytics Advisory Specialist | Sep 2015 - Apr 2018

title: Revenue growth
text:

title: Hobbies
text:
Achieving peak performance in both mind and body demands a commitment to meaningful extracurricular activities. Arun passionately dedicates himself to a diverse range of endeavors, strategically honing his mental acuity and enhancing his physical vitality. This deliberate investment translates into an exceptional ability to channel an unparalleled 200% concentration towards elevating the success of our valued clients’ businesses.











 


 






 



Elevate your data game to extraordinary heights with Arun, our exceptional data yogi. In the face of even the most extreme and stressful conditions, Arun seamlessly executes a dazzling array of data gymnastics, ensuring unparalleled precision and insight. Trust Arun to not only meet but exceed your data challenges, propelling your business into a realm of excellence and success.
